snippet.title: GAMEPLAY TEASER Mobs 'N Monsters on Steam
snippet.description:
Manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction! 

Coming 2025 to Steam. 

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3277990/Mobs_N_Monsters/
